welcome_message_body: Welcome to Raymore, where charm meets adventure! Known for its quaint neighborhoods and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
